text: bam-e neohuileul jamdeulge hamyeo naj-e neohuideul-i haenghaneun modeun geos-eul aneun bun-i geubun-isimyeo naj-e neohuideul eul ilkkaewo jeonghayeojin gigan-eul suhaeng hage hamdo geubun-isigeoneul neohuido geubun-egelo dol-aganila geubun-eun neohuideul-i haenghaessdeon modeun sasil-eul neohui deul-ege boyeojusilila
